1: 2023: We welcomed HEK as a client and started sharpening our focus on connecting arts and culture organizations with decentralized tech and tools.
2: 2023: We stayed local for our yearly retreat, spending a week on Toronto Island to talk governance, plan and strategize for the coming year.
3: 2024: We solidified our reputation as the only people wearing pants at the crazy-making Web3 conflagration.
4: 2024: We unlocked another level of retreat planning, with activities including an Ikebana workshop and a team-building Dragon Boating outing.
